question: もの
sourceAnswer:
<tag><ja>物</ja></tag>:: thing/object/article/stuff/substance | one's-things/possessions/property/belongings | things/something/anything/everything/nothing | quality | reason/the-way-of-things | used-to-emphasize-emotion,-judgment,-etc./used-to-indicate-a-common-occurrence-in-the-past-(after-a-verb-in-past-tense)/used-to-indicate-a-general-tendency/used-to-indicate-something-that-should-happen | item-classified-as-.../item-related-to-.../work-in-the-genre-of-... | cause-of-.../cause-for-... | somehow/somewhat/for-some-reason | really/truly
indicates-reason-or-excuse | indicates-dissatisfaction/indicates-desire-to-be-pampered-or-indulged
